name: Pirates Beware!
description:
You are a loyal gamer who has bought all the games that you've wanted and you take it very seriously. When browsing on the internet though you keep hearing about software pirates. Every day,and Every NIght. On the news and on Youtube. So you've had enough and you decide to hack all the pirates and take their info to use against them. 

CONTROLS

use the Arrow Keys to move.

use the A button to activate a shield when score is 10 or higher.
